content: vmpsfs:MAINT720.utils.vmarc V 3. Run the VMWW2 VMARC file through this pipeline: ===> pipe < vmww2 vmarc W | fblock 80 00 | > vmww2 vmarc W f 80 Ready; 4. Unpack the contents: ===> VMARC unpack vmww2 W = = W 5. You can now use these grant commands to grant access to the browser for all virtual machines: ===> grant auth vmpsfs:vmww2. to public ( read newread ===> grant auth * * vmpsfs:vmww2. to public ( read Alternatively, you can substitute individual users in place of public: ===> grant auth vmpsfs:vmww2. to FMIRANDA ( read newread 6. You can now use Charlotte by issuing this command from any virtual machine to which you granted authorization: ===> VMLINK .DIR VMPSFS:VMWW2. < . Z-A * > (INVOKE WW2 Note: Before you download anything from the VM Download Library, you must read the license agreement for downloads to ensure that you can comply with the terms. Important: We did not put this data into a Shared File System (SFS) directory under MAINT or MAINT720 because you must not access
